errors.cause: Function under test crashed with generated input

solutions.code:
// Check crash_* file in output directory
// Contains minimal reproducer

errors.cause: Single input took too long to process

solutions.code:
// Limit work per input
if (input.size() > kMaxInputSize) return;
--fuzz_test_timeout_per_input=10s

// Check for O(nÂ²) or worse algorithms
// that cause timeout with large inputs

errors.message: Fuzz target ran out of memory
errors.cause: Target allocated too much memory for input

solutions.code: --fuzz_test_rss_limit_mb=1024

errors.cause: Fuzzer has saturated discoverable code paths

solutions.code:
FUZZ_TEST(MyTest, MyFunction)
  .WithSeeds({"valid_input", "edge_case"});
// Coverage saturation may mean good coverage

errors.cause: Property assertion failed for generated input

solutions.code: // Check output for minimal failing case
// Property test found real bug

errors.cause: Domain specification is invalid or contradictory

solutions.code:
// Ensure min <= max
fuzztest::InRange(0, 100)  // Not InRange(100, 0)

// For strings
fuzztest::String().WithMinSize(0).WithMaxSize(100);

FUZZ_TEST(TestSuite, FunctionName)
  .WithDomains(fuzztest::Arbitrary<std::string>());

cc_test(
  name = "my_test",
  deps = ["@com_google_fuzztest//fuzztest"],
)

errors.cause: Seed corpus file format is incorrect

solutions.code:
// Corpus files should be raw binary
// No special encoding needed

FUZZ_TEST(Test, Func)
  .WithSeeds({"seed1", "seed2"});

// See specific sanitizer documentation
// Fix the underlying bug

// FuzzTest saves crash input
// Run with crash input to debug
// Use non-minimized input for debugging
// Manually reduce input while preserving crash
